algorithm_technique: Recursive traversal and merging of Quad-Trees.
Combine sub-trees based on leaf node values and logical OR.
problem_summary_simple: Perform a logical OR operation on two binary grids represented as Quad-Trees.
problem_summary_technical: Recursively merge two Quad-Trees, performing logical OR on leaf nodes and combining children for non-leaf nodes.
time_complexity: O(N), where N is the number of nodes in the larger Quad-Tree.
space_complexity: O(h), where h is the height of the Quad-Tree (log N).
key_insights: Base cases: if one node is a leaf, return it if its value is 1, otherwise return the other node.
If both nodes are leaves, return a new leaf node with the OR of their values.
If both are internal nodes, recursively merge their children and check if the resulting children can be merged into a single leaf.
